scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -R src/prisma/migrations dist/prisma/
scripts.release:patch: npm run prepublish && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run prepublish && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run prepublish && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
scripts.migrate:dev: prisma migrate dev --schema=./src/prisma/schema.prisma && npm run generate
scripts.migrate:deploy: prisma migrate deploy --schema=./src/prisma/schema.prisma && npm run generate
